tasks.label: Run Point of Sale
tasks.command: javac -d bin -cp 'lib\*;src' src/com/puntoventa/model/*.java src/com/puntoventa/dao/*.java src/com/puntoventa/controller/*.java src/com/puntoventa/util/*.java src/com/puntoventa/view/*.java src/com/puntoventa/view/Boton/inventory/*.java && java -cp 'bin;lib\*' com.puntoventa.view.MainWindow
